snippet: The Álvarez Puga consulting company, which has longstanding connections to top politicians, is accused of a scheme to pocket tax payments and engage in other fraudulent practices.
abstract: Mexican officials are carrying out an extensive fraud investigation into a consulting firm managed by brothers Alejandro and Victor Alvarez Puga, which provides administrative services and fiscal advice to a long list of widely recognized companies; case has lifted a veil on the widespread tax evasion in the growing and increasingly powerful Mexican outsourcing industry.
lead_paragraph: The Álvarez Puga consulting company, which has longstanding connections to top politicians, is accused of a scheme to pocket tax payments and engage in other fraudulent practices.

headline.seo: Inquiry Into Outsourcing Firm Stirs Mexican Political Circles
headline.main: Inquiry Into Brothers’ Outsourcing Firm Stirs High Political Circles in Mexico
